EmailTemplate.description: Template to provide details to assistants of their upcoming class
EmailTemplate.name: Assistant - upcoming class details
EmailTemplate.subject: You are registered to be an assistant at the upcoming Code Club session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This is to remind you that you are an assistant on the upcoming session
Date/Time: {!Class__c.Class_Date__c} Location: Generator Board Room, Ground Floor, 12 Madden St
The Session Leader is {!Class__c.Session_Leader_Name__c} - please confirm with them that you will be there on time.
For a full class list, click here: Classic: https://codeclub-nz.my.salesforce.com/00O7F000001hzoN?&pv0={!Class__c.Id} Lightning: https://codeclub-nz.lightning.force.com/one/one.app#/sObject/00O7F000001hzoNUAQ/view?=undefined&fv0={!Class__c.Id}
(Just in case you can't remember your username in this org, it is {!Contact.Username__c}).
Please confirm with any other staff members that they are ready to help you.
The Topic for this class is {!Class__c.Project_Topic__c} and the content can be found here: {!Class__c.Content_URL__c}.
Have fun and keep the students keen.
On the completion of the class - please ensure that the attendance status of all the students is updated. This Class's record can be found here: https://codeclub-nz.my.salesforce.com/{!Class__c.Id}.
...and don't forget to log your time in the Salesforce.org system. Here's a direct link to the activity record where you can log your time once you have signed in via Aloha https://foundation.my.salesforce.com/apex/Volunteerforce1?sfdc.tabName=01r80000000Gzb4#/log-hours?log-step=3
If you haven't already got a Trinket account, then sign up here: https://trinket.io/signup . It's a bit like Trailhead - you need to log into your Trinket account before you can save any work you do
Regards, Code Club Aotearoa and Salesforce New Zealand
